Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Looking at Case A1 listing out the events in order to see the sequence Retrieve raw metal sheet Scan barcode Place metal sheet on table Align metal sheet Preheat metal sheet Pick up welding tool Weld corner A Weld corner B Measure weld integrity Apply protective coating Dry coating Visual check

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The first few steps are about getting the material ready Retrieve scanning placing aligning preheating the metal sheet That seems like preparing the material before any assembly So Material Preparation as the first high level step

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Next after preheating the operator picks up a tool and starts welding The welding steps picking tool welding corners A and B are part of the assembly process The next step after welding is measuring the weld integrity which is a quality check But maybe the welding and the immediate quality check are part of the assembly step Or is the quality check a separate step

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The problem says to group into coherent stages The example given in the prompt Quality Inspection as a step So perhaps the integrity measure is part of that

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let me check the other case B2 to confirm consistency Case B2 has similar events with the same sequence The steps are the same so the grouping should be consistent

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Wait but maybe the quality check after welding is part of the assembly step Or a separate quality inspection stage Since the example includes Quality Inspection as a separate step maybe step 9 is part of a Quality Inspection step

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Grouping events based on temporal proximity same resources or logical sequence The welding steps after the material is prepared the operator picks up the tool then welds The pick up tool is part of the assembly process steps 6 to 8 are assembly actions The integrity check is a quality check so that would be a separate step Quality Inspection

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The coating steps applying and drying are part of a finishing or coating process and then the visual check is another quality check So possible high level steps Material Preparation steps 1 5 Assembly steps 6 8 Quality Check 1 step 9 Coating Application steps 10 11 Final Quality Check step 12
